channel.title: Half-Life Expansions
channel.description: Has anyone heard anything concerning if they are going to do the same thing to the expansions Blue Shift and Opposing Forces as they did with the original Half-Life game? I am currently playing Opposing Forces and finished Blue Shift a few days ago and thought they both would look good and benefit if they were modded too.

item.title: Half-Life Expansions
item.dc:creator: JeffMOD
item.description:
There is actually a team of fine people doing their own rendition of both the expansions from scratch the way the BM team did HL, and you can find them here.
There is also a small talented team working on remaking Blue Shift using Black Mesa as a base - official thread here.
